feed.title: Comments on Creative Commons Posts "Defining Noncommercial" Report
feed.subtitle: ast year I participated in a survey followed up by a focus group on the topic of Noncommercial Use, in particular around the context that about 2/3rds of the Creative Commons licenses extant use the NC attribute, such as in CC-BY-NC. (post continues with details and commentary...)

link.title: Comments on Creative Commons Posts "Defining Noncommercial" Report
